comment.author: 26880198@N05
comment._content: Captures the excitement and adulation of these incredibly brave men! My Heroes and always will be. "Keep Gazing At The Stars"

comment.author: 27468846@N03
comment._content: Excellent design of lightweight spacesuits, which I can always use in my speculative fiction novels and screenplays. Thanks a million for sharing. “Spatio et Ultra!”
